name: Reaper GBA Demake
description:
This game is a demake-demo of the first level of of this Ludum Dare 48 submission  

You are the Grim Reaper from the future. You traveled back in time to stop a crime lord of the 80's, to save the future. But he is expecting you and has set up his defenses deep in his base. It is your job to go deeper and deeper into the base, kill the crime lord and everyone associated with him.

Controls

As the Grim Reaper you have skills to help you achive your goal. Your skills are:

  • Rotating for maximum attack range. (Hold left and right bumpers)
  • Swinging your scythe for close attacks. (Press A button)
  • Throwing your scythe for long ranged attack, but beware you cannot attack normally while throwing you scythe. (Hold A button)
  • Teleporting into enemies and mind controlling them. (Hold B button to bring up power up selection screen, press left and right bumpers to switch between them. Release B button to activate power up on closest enemy to cursor)
